title: <:diamond_shape:1013899470867537990> Booster
description:
The <@&1000036253208678420> role is given to those who **boost the server at least once**.

**Perks**
- Access a role menu to choose one of 20+ colors for your name
- All of the VIP Perks
- Access to Booster gated giveaways (Chance to receive products for **free**!)

**Note**
These perks are only available during the time the user is boosting the server, meaning they are not permanent and will be removed when the boosting stops.
